AT.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
AT.description: Schnapp dir deinen Touchpen und fang an zu stapeln! Puzzles müssen süchtig machen. Das war uns bei der Entwicklung besonders wichtig. Mit 200 Puzzles stellt Art of Balance TOUCH! nicht nur deine Fähigkeiten, sondern auch deine Vorstellungskraft auf die Probe. Das Spiel ist einfach zu lernen, aber nur schwer aus der Hand zu legen. Auf der Suche nach einer Herausforderung? Dann probiere die Punktejagd aus und treibe deine Punktzahl in ungeahnte Höhen. Art of Balance TOUCH! bringt das ultimative "nur noch ein Puzzle"-Gefühl auf deinen Nintendo 3DS™.

AU.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
AU.description: Grab your stylus and build a balanced stack in this physics-based puzzler! Puzzle games must be addictive. This was our top priority during the development of the game. That's why we designed 200 levels that not only challenge your skills but also your imagination. With its perfect touch controls 'Art of Balance TOUCH!' is easy to pick up and hard to put away. Seeking a real challenge? Then try out the new endurance mode and drive your score ever higher. Art of Balance TOUCH! brings the ultimate “just one more puzzle” experience to your Nintendo 3DS™.

BG.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
BG.description: Grab your stylus and build a balanced stack in this physics-based puzzler! Puzzle games must be addictive. This was our top priority during the development of the game. That's why we designed 200 levels that not only challenge your skills but also your imagination. With its perfect touch controls 'Art of Balance TOUCH!' is easy to pick up and hard to put away. Seeking a real challenge? Then try out the new endurance mode and drive your score ever higher. Art of Balance TOUCH! brings the ultimate “just one more puzzle” experience to your Nintendo 3DS™.

BE.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
BE.description: Prenez votre stylet et réalisez un tas équilibré dans ce casse-tête basé sur la physique. Les casse-têtes doivent être addictifs. C'était notre priorité lors du développement du jeu. C'est pourquoi nous avons conçu 200 niveaux qui vont aussi bien mettre votre dextérité que votre imagination à l'épreuve. Grâce aux commandes tactiles, « Art of Balance TOUCH! » est simple à prendre en main et dur à quitter. Vous recherchez un véritable défi ? Essayez donc le tout nouveau mode Endurance pour que vos scores atteignent des sommets. Avec « Art of Balance TOUCH! », vous ne pourrez plus lâcher votre Nintendo 3DS™ !

ES.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
ES.description: ¡Coge tu lápiz táctil y construye una pila estable en este puzle de física! Los juegos de puzle tienen que ser adictivos. Esta era nuestra máxima prioridad durante el desarrollo del juego. Por eso diseñamos 200 niveles que no solo ponen a prueba tus habilidades, sino también tu imaginación. Con sus perfectos controles táctiles, Art of Balance TOUCH! es fácil de comprender y difícil de dejar. ¿Buscas un auténtico desafío? Pues prueba el nuevo modo Resistencia y aumenta sin parar tu puntuación. Art of Balance TOUCH! trae a lo grande esa sensación de "solo un puzle más" a tu consola Nintendo 3DS™.

IT.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
IT.description: Prendi lo stilo e metti gli oggetti in equilibrio l'uno sull'altro, in questo rompicapo fisico! I rompicapi devono essere irresistibili: questa è stata la nostra priorità più grande in fase di sviluppo del gioco. Ecco perché abbiamo progettato 200 livelli che mettono alla prova non soltanto le tue abilità, ma anche la tua immaginazione. Grazie ai pratici comandi del touch screen, Art of Balance TOUCH! è facile da imparare e ti regalerà ore di puro divertimento. Sei in cerca di una vera sfida? Allora prova la nuova modalità di resistenza e porta sempre più in alto il tuo punteggio. Grazie ad Art of Balance TOUCH! portai divertirti con un altro fantastico rompicapo per la tua console Nintendo 3DS™.

NL.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
NL.description: Pak je stylus en bouw een gebalanceerde stapel in deze fysicapuzzel! Puzzelspellen moeten verslavend zijn. Dat was ons voornaamste aandachtspunt tijdens de ontwikkeling van het spel. Daarom hebben we 200 levels ontworpen die niet alleen je vaardigheden op de proef stellen, maar ook je verbeeldingskracht. Dankzij zijn perfecte touchscreenbesturing is 'Art of Balance TOUCH!' eenvoudig om te spelen, maar moeilijk om weg te leggen. Zoek je een echte uitdaging? Probeer dan de nieuwe uithoudingsmodus en behaal een nóg hogere score. Met de Art of Balance TOUCH! voor Nintendo 3DS™ blijf je spelen!

NZ.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
NZ.description: Grab your stylus and build a balanced stack in this physics-based puzzler! Puzzle games must be addictive. This was our top priority during the development of the game. That's why we designed 200 levels that not only challenge your skills but also your imagination. With its perfect touch controls 'Art of Balance TOUCH!' is easy to pick up and hard to put away. PL.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
PL.description: Grab your stylus and build a balanced stack in this physics-based puzzler! Puzzle games must be addictive. This was our top priority during the development of the game. That's why we designed 200 levels that not only challenge your skills but also your imagination. With its perfect touch controls 'Art of Balance TOUCH!' is easy to pick up and hard to put away. Seeking a real challenge? Then try out the new endurance mode and drive your score ever higher. Art of Balance TOUCH! brings the ultimate “just one more puzzle” experience to your Nintendo 3DS™.

PT.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
PT.description: Pega no teu stylus e constrói uma pilha balanceada neste jogo de puzzles baseado na física! Os jogos de puzzles têm que ser viciantes. Esta foi a nossa principal prioridade durante o desenvolvimento do jogo. Foi por isso que criámos 200 níveis que não só desafiam a tua habilidade como também a tua imaginação. Com os seus controlos perfeitos, "Art of Balance TOUCH!" é fácil de pegar mas difícil de largar. Procuras um desafio real? Então tenta o novo modo resistência e eleva ainda mais a tua pontuação. "Art of Balance TOUCH!" oferece a derradeira experiência "só mais um puzzle" na tua Nintendo 3DS™.

RU.name: Art of Balance TOUCH!
RU.description: Возьмите стилус и постройте аккуратную башню, учитывая баланс ее сегментов! «Головоломки должны поддерживать интерес», — этим принципом руководствовались разработчики при создании игры. Более 200 уровней станут испытанием не только ваших рефлексов, но и воображения! А благодаря интуитивному управлению начать играть очень просто, а остановиться – как раз наоборот! Для тех, кто ищет испытание посерьезней, предусмотрен режим Endurance — совершенствуйтесь и устанавливайте новые рекорды! Art of Balance TOUCH! — идеальная головоломка для Nintendo 3DS™!
